subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers won 29 games and a second consecutive Atlantic Coast Conference regular-season crown, and their maniacal devotion to defense and excruciatingly deliberate offense are drawing criticism.
snippet: The Cavaliers won 29 games and a second consecutive Atlantic Coast Conference regular-season crown, and their maniacal devotion to defense and excruciatingly deliberate offense are drawing criticism.
